title: Kissa Tanpopo

title: Miniature Mystique
description: A fairy meets a mysterious rabbit under a huge mossy tree. Inspired by Arrietty and Rococo art, this photo collage blends real nature shots from North Vancouver with a dreamy, fantasy twist. Made in Photoshop and featuring my friend Hilary (@Hil_i_21).
